title: OnePlus launches a Ceramic White OnePlus 10 Pro “Extreme Edition” with 512GB storage
content:
OnePlus unveiled its latest flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 10 Pro, in China last month. During the event, OnePlus showcased the phone in two color variants — Volcanic Black and Emerald Forest. However, the company did not unveil the white variant that we spotted in a leak just a day before the launch. Today, the company

The post OnePlus launches a Ceramic White OnePlus 10 Pro “Extreme Edition” with 512GB storage appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Almost a month after launching the OnePlus 10 Pro, OnePlus has unveiled a new ceramic white Extreme Edition variant of the device with 512GB storage.
